name: Scryer's Tower
completeE: Place the Scryer's Tower on any empty tile. Gain 1 influence for each adjacent Cave or Crystal building (Pendantmaker, Amphitheater, Hippodrome)
visitE: The next time you take any kind of event card, draw 2 and choose from between them

name: Fishing Spot
completeE: Place the Fishing spot on a lake. Gain 1 influence per each adjacent floodplain. Once placed, it is possible to traverse over the lake.
visitE: Roll 1d6. If you get a 5 or a 6, you have caught a fish! Gain 1 influence.

name: Portal Circle
completeE: Place two Portal Circle tiles anywhere on the board. You may move to one of the two portal tiles.
visitE: Instantly teleport to the other Portal Circle without expending your speed.
